tool_description: Creates official claim record in the system with unique claim number and establishes initial claim status and tracking.

policy_number.description: Insurance policy number associated with the claim

report_date.description: Date when the claim was reported

coverage_types.description: Applicable coverage types for this claim

assigned_adjuster.description: ID of assigned adjuster if already determined

priority_flag.description: Whether this claim requires priority handling

error_messages: Policy validation failed: Cannot register claim for invalid or expired policy.
Incident report not found: The provided incident_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid date sequence: Report date cannot be earlier than loss date.
No applicable coverage: At least one coverage type must be specified.
Registration system unavailable: Unable to generate claim number due to system issues.
Duplicate claim detected: A claim for this incident may already exist.
usage: Provide policy_number, incident_id, loss_date, report_date, coverage_types, and estimated_loss to register a new claim. Include assigned_adjuster and priority_flag as needed.

claim_number.description: Unique claim number assigned to this claim

claim_status.description: Initial status of the registered claim

registration_timestamp.description: When the claim was officially registered

workflow_stage.description: Current stage in the claims workflow process

next_actions.description: List of next required actions for claim processing
